summary: The idyllic life of a young Cajun boy and his pet raccoon is disrupted when the tranquility of the bayou is broken by an oil well drilling near his home.
cast: Joseph Boudreaux|Lionel Le Blanc|E. Bienvenu|Frank Hardy|C.P. Guedry|Oscar J. Yarborough
director: Director: Robert J. Flaherty (as Robert Flaherty)
title: Louisiana Story
